title: LF ADC Main for a ranked 5's team
body:
Hello, I am looking for any ADC mains interested in joining a ranked 5's team. You must be level 30 but rank does't matter. You also must have Skype. Preferably looking for anyone around 16-20 although age does not matter. If you are interested please tell me:

Your Summoner Name:
Your Rank (Or rank last season):
Your Age:
Your Favourite ADC's:
Also include any other facts.

Thank you all very much.

replies.body:
Your Summoner Name:FBI Robin
Your Rank (Or rank last season):S2 Peaked at S1 last season. 
Your Age:18
Your Favourite ADC's:{{champion:104}} , {{champion:51}} , {{champion:42}} , {{champion:429}} , {{champion:81}} 
I am easy to get along with, and have quite the aggressive play style. I would love to further my progression as a league of legends player :)

Hello,
The recruitment process is beginning now so I have added you all, hope you come online for trials now :)

Your Summoner Name: HadesUnicorn
Your Rank (Or rank last season):Silver 2
Your Age:16
Your Favourite ADC's:Jinx Ezreal Graves Trist
I can play any role confidently and i used to main supp :)

> Your Summoner Name: TTMY
> Your Rank (Or rank last season): Gold 1 
> Your Age: 17
> Your Favourite ADC's: {{champion:222}} {{champion:429}} {{champion:51}} 
> Also include any other facts. I just like the game

IGN: NightTemplar or Wolves
Rank: Gold 3 and 4
Age: 20
Unliked: Vayne and Varus the rest are fine
Can Play any other roles

Your Summoner Name: DeadlyKiller
Your Rank (Or rank last season): Bronze 2
Your Age: 15
Your Favourite ADC's: Jinx, Lucian, Sivir, Tristana, Caitlyn and Vayne
Also include any other facts. I can play support very well, I can play jungle good, I can play mid good, Im not good at top :)

Your Summoner Name: 1NF M Miracles
Your Rank (Or rank last season): This Season gold 4 Last Season Gold 2
Your Age: 16
Your Favourite ADC's: Sivir, Lucian, Graves, Corki
Also include any other facts. Team Captain and Support for 1NFEKTED Manipulation, Looking for a group people to play with and practise with other than my main team, also looking for another team in which i can practise other positions

So just to clarify I will add you all at 7:30 NZT on the Sunday, after that I will play a game with you ( We will also have others that are on the ranked team there) Also, if you can not play at the time just message me and we can reschedule,

Thank you all ðŸ˜Š

Your Summoner Name: My Team Is Great
Your Rank (Or rank last season): Silver 3
Your Age: 20
Your Favourite ADC's: Jinx, Draven, Graves, Ezreal
Also include any other facts. 
I main jungle.

Your Summoner Name: Alphabetical
Your Rank (Or rank last season): Silver 3 - now Bronze 3 and haven't played for a bit. (Was gone for a month due to family reason, will explain if required :) ) 
Your Age: 16, coming close to 17.
Your Favourite ADC's: Corki, Lucian, Graves, Jinx and now learning Kalista.

Also include any other facts:

I've played on multiple other teams in multiple different roles, but mainly AD. Had tournament experience against statistically and rank wise better players and have come out ahead in some situations, can shot call from the AD role, have been told i'm easy to work with and adaptable. I'm willing to play as much as I can to improve with or without the team. :)

Sorry guys, I cannot add you until around Sunday at 7:00pm, but after that time I will add you all. Then we will see you guys play and me and my team will decide. Thank you all for your applications though :)

Your Summoner Name: Volitch
Your Rank (Or Rank last season): Silver 3/ GOld 5 last season
Your Age: 17 turning 18 in june
Your Favourite ADC's: Kalista, Graves, Jinx, Vayne, Quinn, Sivir
i am ready to play and play seriously for a team willing to do well

Your Summoner Name: Posso The Pimp
Your Rank (Or rank last season):silver 4/ gold 5 last season 
Your Age: 16
Your Favorite ADC's: vayne lucian jinx and more 
I've got skype and ready to play  
message me if you wanna talk

Your Summoner Name: ZeroZephyr
Your Rank (Or rank last season):S1 last season atm S5
Your Age: 16
Your Favourite ADC's: Corki, Vayne, Sivir, Jinx
Also include any other facts: I'm Asian so you should hire me lol jk but i really am an Asian. I'm really keen to play with a team and i want to prove that oce can play at worlds lol. Sorry for my bad english. :)

Your Summoner Name: KINGOFTHRON3S
Your Rank (Or rank last season): B2 last season B4 current
Your Age: 28
Your Favourite ADC's: Jinx, Caitlin, Vayne
Facts: I have solid stats for my ADC role if you look me up i am really keen to play with some people that take the game seriously are mature and want to really get the team ranked somewhere decent.
